H0.text: Sufferers, Locksmen and Dreads are followers of which religion. Hindu

H1.text: Sufferers, Locksmen and Dreads are followers of which religion. Sikh

H2.text: Sufferers, Locksmen and Dreads are followers of which religion. Nazirite

H3.text: Sufferers, Locksmen and Dreads are followers of which religion. Rastaman

A4.text: Rastas differ on whether they regard dreadlocks as compulsory for practicing the religion.

A5.text: Rastas believe that dreadlocks are promoted in the Bible, specifically in the Book of Numbers, and regard them as a symbol of strength linked to the hair of the Biblical figure of Samson.
